00710   oPopDriver << "      {" << endl;
00711   oPopDriver << "         nBMeasurePointIn = NonmemPars::nBMeasurePointIn;" << endl;
00712   oPopDriver << "         bMeasurePointIn.resize( nBTwoStageOrNonparam * nBMeasurePointIn );" << endl;
00713   oPopDriver << endl;
00714   oPopDriver << "         // Prepare the randon number generator." << endl;
00715   oPopDriver << "         gsl_rng* randNumberGen                 = 0;" << endl;
00716   oPopDriver << "         const gsl_rng_type* randNumberGenType  = gsl_rng_default;" << endl;
00717   oPopDriver << "         randNumberGen                          = gsl_rng_alloc( randNumberGenType );" << endl;
00718   oPopDriver << "         gsl_rng_set( randNumberGen, seed );" << endl;
00719   oPopDriver << "         assert( randNumberGen != 0 );" << endl;
00720   oPopDriver << endl;
00721   oPopDriver << "         // Choose the initial measure point using the random uniform" << endl;
00722   oPopDriver << "         // distribution," << endl;
00723   oPopDriver << "         //" << endl;
00724   oPopDriver << "         //     bIn      ~  Uniform[bNonparamLow   , bNonparamUp   ]  ." << endl;
00725   oPopDriver << "         //        j(k)                         (k)             (k)" << endl;
00726   oPopDriver << "         //" << endl;
00727   oPopDriver << "         for( int j=0; j<nBMeasurePointIn; j++ )" << endl;
00728   oPopDriver << "         {" << endl;
00729   oPopDriver << "            for(int k = 0; k < nBTwoStageOrNonparam; k++)" << endl;
00730   oPopDriver << "            {" << endl;
00731   oPopDriver << "               bMeasurePointIn[k + j * nBTwoStageOrNonparam] = " << endl;
00732   oPopDriver << "                 gsl_ran_flat( randNumberGen, bNonparamLow[k], bNonparamUp[k] );" << endl;
00733   oPopDriver << "            }" << endl;
00734   oPopDriver << "         }" << endl;
00735   oPopDriver << "      }" << endl;
00736   oPopDriver << "      else if( objective == NONPARAM_GRID )" << endl;
00737   oPopDriver << "      {" << endl;
00738   oPopDriver << "         nBMeasurePointPerDimIn = NonmemPars::nBMeasurePointPerDimIn;" << endl;
00739   oPopDriver << "         nBMeasurePointIn = static_cast<int>( " << endl;
00740   oPopDriver << "            std::pow( static_cast<double>( nBMeasurePointPerDimIn ), nBTwoStageOrNonparam ) );" << endl;
00741   oPopDriver << "         bMeasurePointIn.resize( nBTwoStageOrNonparam * nBMeasurePointIn );" << endl;
00742   oPopDriver << endl;
00743   oPopDriver << "         // Start all of the elements' indices equal to one." << endl;
00744   oPopDriver << "         valarray<int> index( 1, nBTwoStageOrNonparam );" << endl;
00745   oPopDriver << endl;
00746   oPopDriver << "         // Set the initial measure points equal to a grid with" << endl;
00747   oPopDriver << "         // nBMeasurePointPerDimIn points in each dimension, and with" << endl;
00748   oPopDriver << "         // the following spacing between each grid point," << endl;
00749   oPopDriver << "         //" << endl;
00750   oPopDriver << "         //      bNonparamUp    -  bNonparamLow" << endl;
00751   oPopDriver << "         //                 (k)                (k)" << endl;
00752   oPopDriver << "         //" << endl;
00753   oPopDriver << "         //     -----------------------------------  ." << endl;
00754   oPopDriver << "         //" << endl;
00755   oPopDriver << "         //        nBMeasurePointPerDimIn - 1" << endl;
00756   oPopDriver << "         //" << endl;
00757   oPopDriver << "         for( int j=0; j<nBMeasurePointIn; j++ )" << endl;
00758   oPopDriver << "         {" << endl;
00759   oPopDriver << "            for(int k = 0; k < nBTwoStageOrNonparam; k++)" << endl;
00760   oPopDriver << "            {" << endl;
00761   oPopDriver << "               bMeasurePointIn[k + j * nBTwoStageOrNonparam] = " << endl;
00762   oPopDriver << "                 bNonparamLow[k] +" << endl;
00763   oPopDriver << "                 ( index[k] - 1 ) * " << endl;
00764   oPopDriver << "                 ( bNonparamUp[k] - bNonparamLow[k] ) / ( nBMeasurePointPerDimIn - 1 );" << endl;
00765   oPopDriver << "            }" << endl;
00766   oPopDriver << endl;
00767   oPopDriver << "            // Add one to the last element's index." << endl;
00768   oPopDriver << "            index[nBTwoStageOrNonparam - 1]++;" << endl;
00769   oPopDriver << endl;
00770   oPopDriver << "            // Update all of the elements' indices." << endl;
00771   oPopDriver << "            for(int k = nBTwoStageOrNonparam - 1; k > 0; k--)" << endl;
00772   oPopDriver << "            {" << endl;
00773   oPopDriver << "               // See if this index is larger than the number of" << endl;
00774   oPopDriver << "               // points per dimension." << endl;
00775   oPopDriver << "               if ( index[k] > nBMeasurePointPerDimIn )" << endl;
00776   oPopDriver << "               {" << endl;
00777   oPopDriver << "                  // Reset this element's index to one." << endl;
00778   oPopDriver << "                  index[k] = 1;" << endl;
00779   oPopDriver << endl;
00780   oPopDriver << "                  // Add one to the index for the previous element," << endl;
00781   oPopDriver << "                  // i.e., do a carry operation like in addition." << endl;
00782   oPopDriver << "                  index[k-1]++;" << endl;
00783   oPopDriver << "               }" << endl;
00784   oPopDriver << "            }" << endl;
00785   oPopDriver << "         }" << endl;
00786   oPopDriver << "      }" << endl;
00787   oPopDriver << "      else" << endl;
00788   oPopDriver << "      {" << endl;
00789   oPopDriver << "         for( int i=0; i<nPop; i++ )" << endl;
00790   oPopDriver << "         {" << endl;
00791   oPopDriver << "            model.selectIndividual( i ); " << endl;
00792   oPopDriver << "            model.getIndPar( biIn );" << endl;
00793   oPopDriver << "            bIn[ slice(i*nB, nB, 1) ] = biIn;" << endl;
00794   oPopDriver << "         }" << endl;
00795   oPopDriver << "      }" << endl;
00796   oPopDriver << endl;
00797 
00798   oPopDriver << "      timeval optBegin, optEnd;" << endl;
00799   oPopDriver << "      double  optTimeSec = 0.0;" << endl;

01484   oPopDriver << "               errors.push( e );" << endl;
01485   oPopDriver << "               if ( !isPopOptAtMaxIter )" << endl;
01486   oPopDriver << "                  ret = OPT_OK_RESID_ERROR;" << endl;
01487   oPopDriver << "               else" << endl;
01488   oPopDriver << "                  ret = OPT_MAX_ITER_RESID_ERROR;" << endl;
01489   oPopDriver << "            }" << endl;
01490   oPopDriver << "            set.replacePPred   ( pPredOut );"           << endl;
01491   oPopDriver << "            set.replacePRes    ( pResOut );"            << endl;
01492   oPopDriver << "            set.replacePWRes   ( pResWtdOut );"         << endl;
01493   oPopDriver << "            set.replacePEtaRes ( pParResOut );"         << endl;
01494   oPopDriver << "            set.replacePWEtaRes( pParResWtdOut );"      << endl;
01495   oPopDriver << endl;
01496   oPopDriver << "            try{" << endl;
01497   oPopDriver << "               if( objective == FIRST_ORDER  || objective == NAIVE_FIRST_ORDER )" << endl;
01498   oPopDriver << "               {" << endl;
01499   oPopDriver << "                  bool calcFoModelMinimizer = true;"       << endl;
01500   oPopDriver << "                  popResiduals( modelForDisposal, "        << endl;
01501   oPopDriver << "                                objective, "               << endl;
01502   oPopDriver << "                                NObservs,"                 << endl;
01503   oPopDriver << "                                y,"                        << endl;

01505   oPopDriver << "                                bOut,"                     << endl;

01512   oPopDriver << "                  dataForDisposal.expand( cPredTruncatedOut,   cPredOut );"   << endl;
01513   oPopDriver << "                  dataForDisposal.expand( cResTruncatedOut,    cResOut );"    << endl;

01518   oPopDriver << "                  set.replaceCEtaRes ( cParResOut );"      << endl;

01520   oPopDriver << "               }" << endl;
01521   oPopDriver << "               else" << endl;

01525   oPopDriver << "                  set.replaceCWRes   ( iResWtdOut );"         << endl;
01526   oPopDriver << "                  set.replaceCEtaRes ( iParResOut );"         << endl;
01527   oPopDriver << "                  set.replaceCWEtaRes( iParResWtdOut );"      << endl;
01528   oPopDriver << "               }" << endl;
01529   oPopDriver << "            }" << endl;
01530   oPopDriver << "            catch( SpkException& e )" << endl;
01531   oPopDriver << "            {" << endl;
01532   oPopDriver << "               char message[] = \"Failed during the calculation of conditional residuals.\";" << endl;
01533   oPopDriver << "               SpkError ee( SpkError::SPK_STATISTICS_ERR, message, __LINE__, __FILE__ );" << endl;
01534   oPopDriver << "               e.push( ee );" << endl;
01535   oPopDriver << "               errors.cat( e );" << endl;
01536   oPopDriver << "               isStatSuccess &= false;" << endl;
01537   oPopDriver << "               if ( !isPopOptAtMaxIter )" << endl;
01538   oPopDriver << "                  ret = OPT_OK_RESID_ERROR;" << endl;
01539   oPopDriver << "               else" << endl;
01540   oPopDriver << "                  ret = OPT_MAX_ITER_RESID_ERROR;" << endl;
01541   oPopDriver << "            }" << endl;

01543   oPopDriver << "            {" << endl;
01544   oPopDriver << "               char message[] = \"A standard exception occurred during the calculation of conditional residuals.\";" << endl;
01545   oPopDriver << "               SpkError e( stde, message, __LINE__, __FILE__ );" << endl;
01546   oPopDriver << "               errors.push( e );" << endl;
01547   oPopDriver << "               isStatSuccess &= false;" << endl;
01548   oPopDriver << "               if ( !isPopOptAtMaxIter )" << endl;

02169   oPopDriver << "                  oResults << \"diagonal\";" << endl;

02187   oPopDriver << "               }" << endl;

02191   oPopDriver << "                  int m = (n*(n+1))/2;" << endl;
02192   oPopDriver << "                  valarray<double> full( n * n );" << endl;
02193   oPopDriver << "                  valarray<double> row_minimal( m );" << endl;
02194   oPopDriver << endl;
02195   oPopDriver << "                  // First make a full matrix out of the minimal representation" << endl;
02196   oPopDriver << "                  for( int j=0; j<n; j++ )" << endl;
02197   oPopDriver << "                  {" << endl;
02198   oPopDriver << "                     for( int i=0; i<n-j; i++, idx++ ) // lower only" << endl;
02199   oPopDriver << "                     {" << endl;
02200   oPopDriver << "                        full[ (j*n)+(j+i) ] = sigmaOut[idx];" << endl;
02201   oPopDriver << "                     }" << endl;
02202   oPopDriver << "                  }" << endl;
02203   oPopDriver << endl;
02204   oPopDriver << "                  // Copy the lower triangle to the upper and complete fullification" << endl;
02205   oPopDriver << "                  symmetrize( full, n, full );" << endl;
02206   oPopDriver << endl;
02207   oPopDriver << "                  // Read the lower triangle in the row-major order" << endl;
02208   oPopDriver << "                  for( int i=0, k=0; i<n; i++ )" << endl;
02209   oPopDriver << "                  {" << endl;
02210   oPopDriver << "                     for( int j=0; j<i+1; j++, k++ )" << endl;
02211   oPopDriver << "                     {" << endl;

02213   oPopDriver << "                     }" << endl;
02214   oPopDriver << "                  }" << endl;
02215   oPopDriver << endl;

02217   oPopDriver << "                  {" << endl;
02218   oPopDriver << "                     oResults << \"<value>\" << row_minimal[ i ];" << endl;
02219   oPopDriver << "                     oResults << \"</value>\" << endl;" << endl;
02220   oPopDriver << "                     nParForStats++;" << endl;
02221   oPopDriver << "                  }" << endl;
02222   oPopDriver << "               }" << endl;

02519   oPopDriver << "                        for( int i=0; i<NonmemPars::sigmaBlockDims[ii]; i++, idx++ )" << endl;
02520   oPopDriver << "                        {" << endl;
02521   oPopDriver << "                           oResults << omegaMeasurePointMinRep_jjj[idx] << ( i < NonmemPars::sigmaBlockDims[ii] - 1 ? \",\" : \"\" );" << endl;
02522   oPopDriver << "                        }" << endl;
02523   oPopDriver << "                        oResults << endl;" << endl;
02524   oPopDriver << "                     }" << endl;
02525   oPopDriver << "                     else // full" << endl;
02526   oPopDriver << "                     {" << endl;
02527   oPopDriver << "                        int n = NonmemPars::sigmaBlockDims[ii];" << endl;
02528   oPopDriver << "                        int m = (n*(n+1))/2;" << endl;
02529   oPopDriver << "                        valarray<double> full( n * n );" << endl;
02530   oPopDriver << "                        valarray<double> row_minimal( m );" << endl;
02531   oPopDriver << "      " << endl;
02532   oPopDriver << "                        // First make a full matrix out of the minimal representation" << endl;
02533   oPopDriver << "                        for( int j=0; j<n; j++ )" << endl;
02534   oPopDriver << "                        {" << endl;
02535   oPopDriver << "                           for( int i=0; i<n-j; i++, idx++ ) // lower only" << endl;
02536   oPopDriver << "                           {" << endl;
02537   oPopDriver << "                              full[ (j*n)+(j+i) ] = omegaMeasurePointMinRep_jjj[idx];" << endl;
02538   oPopDriver << "                           }" << endl;
02539   oPopDriver << "                        }" << endl;
02540   oPopDriver << "      " << endl;
02541   oPopDriver << "                        // Copy the lower triangle to the upper and complete fullification" << endl;
02542   oPopDriver << "                        symmetrize( full, n, full );" << endl;
02543   oPopDriver << "      " << endl;
02544   oPopDriver << "                        // Read the lower triangle in the row-major order" << endl;
02545   oPopDriver << "                        for( int i=0, k=0; i<n; i++ )" << endl;
02546   oPopDriver << "                        {" << endl;
02547   oPopDriver << "                           for( int j=0; j<i+1; j++, k++ )" << endl;
02548   oPopDriver << "                           {" << endl;
02549   oPopDriver << "                              row_minimal[k] = full[(i*n)+j];" << endl;
02550   oPopDriver << "                           }" << endl;
02551   oPopDriver << "                        }" << endl;
02552   oPopDriver << "      " << endl;
02553   oPopDriver << "                        for( int i=0; i<m; i++ )" << endl;
02554   oPopDriver << "                        {" << endl;
02555   oPopDriver << "                           oResults << row_minimal[ i ] << ( i < m - 1 ? \",\" : \"\" );" << endl;
02556   oPopDriver << "                        }" << endl;
02557   oPopDriver << "                        oResults << endl;" << endl;
02558   oPopDriver << "                     }" << endl;
02559   oPopDriver << "                  }" << endl;
02560   oPopDriver << "                  oResults << \"</omega_all_out>\" << endl;" << endl;
02561   oPopDriver << "               }" << endl;
02562   oPopDriver << "               oResults << \"</measure_point_out>\" << endl;" << endl;
02563   oPopDriver << endl;
02564   oPopDriver << "               oResults << \"<weight_all_out rows=\\\"\" << nBMeasurePointOut" << endl;
02565   oPopDriver << "                        << \"\\\" columns=\\\"1\\\">\" << endl;" << endl;
02566   oPopDriver << "               for( int jjj=0; jjj<nBMeasurePointOut; jjj++ )" << endl;
02567   oPopDriver << "               {" << endl;
02568   oPopDriver << "                  oResults << bWeightOut[jjj] << endl;" << endl;
02569   oPopDriver << "               }" << endl;
02570   oPopDriver << "               oResults << \"</weight_all_out>\" << endl;" << endl;
02571   oPopDriver << "               oResults << \"<probability_density_all_out rows=\\\"\" << nBMeasurePointOut" << endl;

02574   oPopDriver << "               {" << endl;

02578   oPopDriver << "                     // matrix returned by predNonparamMethod." << endl;

02592   oPopDriver << "                  indModelForTwoStageOrNonparam.getTheta( thetaPostMean_iii );" << endl;
